decisions.title: Technical Plan Approval
decisions.description: Reviewed and approved the technical plan for Credit Card Details. The architecture is standard for this app (Service -> Store -> UI).\nNo major risks identified beyond invoices logic which will be handled in service.

decisions.title: Invoice Payment Implementation
decisions.description: Updated invoice payment logic and fixed type issues.\nAdded 'payInvoice' method using 'transfer' type to avoid double counting expenses.\nFixed lint errors regarding nullability in UI formatting.
